Title: Creates a program to assist municipalities with water quality improvement of water bodies within the municipality managed by lake associations
Summary: Creates a program to assist municipalities with water quality improvement of water bodies within the municipality managed by lake associations.
LawCode: Add ยง15-0519, En Con L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to creating a program to assist local municipalities with water quality improvement of water bodies managed by lake associations
